ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Breath of Harmony?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the same problems trying to hotkey my BoH. I decided to just forget about it and use the song itself because the lock up are annoying. I don t forsee
ygData.messageBody:
I have the same problems trying to hotkey my BoH. I decided to just forget
about it and use the song itself because the lock up are annoying. I don't
forsee myself selling mine any time soon either. =)

Sartori{Legion}
Veeshan


>From: "Kenneth E. Bachman" <kbachman@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: eqbards@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Breath of Harmony?
>Date: Tue, 17 Oct 2000 14:48:39 -0400
>
>On a related note (Bard joke), I find that the proc on the BoH, although it
>is supposedly instantaneous,
>actually takes about half of a normal song cycle to work properly. If I
>assume that it works instantly
>(as the icon suggests), and press another song key, I get song-locked every
>time. It takes some getting
>used to. Has anyone else had this problem? I have a kind of crummy
>machine running on a dial-up, so I'm
>singing through lag a lot, and anticipating song pulses rather than waiting
>for the messages, so maybe the
>rest of you have better luck with it. We were killing the King in Chardok
>last night, and I was singing
>songs two full songs ahead of the messages, which shows how bad it gets for
>me (I was actually able to
>twist three, I've played this Bard so much).
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 53 songs, Innoruuk
